scripts.dev_start: concurrently "cd gameActivityBackEnd && npm run dev_ts" "cd gameActivityFrontEnd && npm run dev" "cd Crawler && python main.py"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd gameActivityBackEnd && npm run start" "cd gameActivityFrontEnd && npm run dev" "cd Crawler && python main.py"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd gameActivityBackEnd && npm install" "cd gameActivityFrontEnd && npm install"
